content: the sun and moon mini wall hanging patterns are the perfect gift for the star gazer in your life this 2 panel wall hanging would make a perfect modern statement piece in your home the pattern is for intermediate crocheters who are comfortable working with more than one color skill level intermediate materials weight 4 / worsted weight yarn 5 00 mm crochet hook please note instructions come with an easy to read easy to understand pattern and are written in u s terminology i have also include charts for both wall hanging panels for those who prefer to follow a chart and not a written pattern thank you so much for stopping by my ravelry shop i am continuing to work on fun and exciting designs the content of this pattern details and photos are property of love & stitch yarn designs distribution copying or sharing of this pattern is not permissible please feel free to use this pattern to create and sell only with credentials of pattern used given to love & stitch yarn designs i d absolutely love to see your product photos please tag or link your items with @loveandstitchh on instagram
